## My Map

```{r cars, echo = FALSE, warning=FALSE,message=FALSE}
library(leaflet)
library(ggmap)
myHP<-c(lat=42.167502,long=-87.7693)
leaflet(myHP) %>% addTiles() %>%
    addMarkers(lat=42.167502,lng=-87.7693,popup="Rosewood Beach")
```
